name: griffon-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of griffon-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of griffon-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: In the style of a detailed concept art, depict a heroic fantasy scene inspired by tabletop gaming, particularly Dungeons & Dragons, in a consistent painterly style. Showcase a griffin with muscular limbs within an environment that feels like a cross between the underwater world and the sky. Use a strict palette of teals, deep blues, and sea-greens with pearl highlights. The griffin should be amidst motion, with realistic aquatic features such as subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents. Also included in the scene is a human silhouette providing scale. The scene should avoid any modern tech or signage, straying away from photographic realism, anime style, bloom glare, or sci-fi UIs. Ensure that the gear worn by the characters is not only grounded in medieval fantasy but also coherent with the culture of the world being portrayed.
